description: This file implements an SSH client utility for executing commands over SSH, using the 'ssh2' library. It exports a function that manages SSH connection, command execution, timeouts, and error handling, primarily for automation purposes in a backend environment.

methods.name: runSshCommand({ host, port, username, password, command, timeoutMs = 10000 })
methods.description: Executes a single SSH command by establishing an SSH connection, managing timeouts, and handling errors. Returns a promise resolving with command output and status information.

ctags.name: runSshCommand
ctags.pattern: /^function runSshCommand({ host, port, username, password, command, timeoutMs = 10000 }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ host, port, username, password, command, timeoutMs = 10000 })
